item.title: PvTIP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvTIP4|1|PvAQP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pteris vittata Functional Descriptions: Heterologous expression in yeast demonstrates that PvTIP4|1|PvAQP1|PvTIP4|1|PvAQP1 was able to facilitate As(III) diffusion.
